original_title: Sri Lanka spot close at 306/309 to the US dollar, bond and t-bill yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka spot closed at closed at 306.00/309.00 to the US dollar while bonds and bills were steady on Tuesday, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 300.00/303.00 rupees on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 22.70/85 percent, steady from 22.90/23.10 percent yesterday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 23.90/24.05 percent, down from 24.15/35 percent from Monday.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 26.00/25 percent, up from 25.75/26.00 percent on Monday.
A six-month maturing bill closed at 20.00/21.00 percent steady from 20.00/75 percent from Monday’s close.
